name: PAPER Anne
description:
The paper world was facing chaos, and paper girl Annie came here to embark on a journey to find herself in this chaotic. All fairy tales will be changed because of her ...

In each fairy tale world, we could change each scene as we wish, and solve the unpredictable puzzles. In here, we will accompany Anne through the magical changes in body scaling, pass through the test of the Cheshire cat who controls the yarn, see through the deceit of the evil queen, grow up with the ugly duckling and perform beautiful music with ballet girl, fight side by side with Tin soldier, and break the dark magic from the rat king ...

At the end, what fate that Annie has to face?

Game Features:
**Elegant and changeable puzzle mechanism
Drag multi-layer paper, change the scene as you wish and discover amazing puzzles.

**Walking around the fantastic world of paper
Based on the hand-painted style the player can build different art scene.

**Collect fascinating story fragments
Base on the story of paper, rewrite your own story track.

**Innovative operating experience
Extremely easy to play, with click and drag to enjoy the extreme gaming experience.
